title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Keep cool when temporary financial snafus arise. Although any mistakes are likely to be discovered quickly, you still may be jarred by the experience. Of course, you might be afraid of losing control of important elements of your life. But remember, a speedy resolution also can shore up your faith. Taking initiative now works for you more than it works against you. Sometimes a glitch can turn into a gift. Good fortune is ultimately the product of responsible behavior. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
